title: New Book Upcoming: The Book that writes itself
description: Finally, the first book of Storybound Studios is now very close to being finished. our team member Powerz is working day and night to finish the book.

title: Welcome to Storybound Studios
description: Welcome to Storybound Studios, a part of Clantum Studios focused on creating and sharing literature-based projects. We’re here to spark imagination and improve literacy in our community. Hope you enjoy your time here—happy reading!
